                     RoofingValidator validator)
        Creates a new RoofingDAO.
        Parameters:
        dao - The RoofingDAO used to query the data storage of the application.
        validator - The object responsible for validating roofings.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public java.util.List<Roofing> get(Constraints<RoofingColumn> constraints)
        Returns the roofings in the data storage. The results can be constrained using the provided constraints.
        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints that modify the resulting list.
        Returns:
        The list of the roofings in the data storage.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When an exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • get

        public java.util.List<Roofing> get()
        Returns the roofings in the data storage.
        Returns:
        The list of the roofings in the data storage.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When an exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • first

        public Roofing first(Constraints<RoofingColumn> constraints)
        Returns the first roofing matching the provided constraints.
        Parameters:
        constraints - The constraints that modify the resulting list.
        Returns:
        The first roofing matching the provided constraints. Returns null when no constraints matches the provided constraints.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When an exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • create

        public Roofing create(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      RoofingType type,
                      boolean active,
                      java.util.List<ComponentReference> components)
               throws RoofingValidatorException
        Inserts a new roofing into the data storage.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the roofing to create.
        description - The description of the roofing to create.
        type - The type of roofing.
        active - Whether or not the roofing can be applied to orders.
        components - The component values.
        Returns:
        The roofing instance representing the newly created roofing.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When an exception occurs while performing the operation.
        RoofingValidatorException - When the provided roofing information is considered invalid.

      • update

        public boolean update(int id,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      boolean active,
                      java.util.List<ComponentReference> components)
               throws RoofingValidatorException
        Updates the entity in the data storage to match the provided roofing.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the roofing to update.
        name - The new name.
        description - The new description.
        active - Whether or not the roofing can be applied to orders.
        components - The new components.
        Returns:
        true if the record was updated.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When an exception occurs while performing the operation.
        RoofingValidatorException - When the provided roofing information is considered invalid.

      • getComponentDefinitions

        public java.util.List<ComponentDefinition> getComponentDefinitions(RoofingType roofingType)
        Returns the components definitions for the provided roofing type.
        Parameters:
        roofingType - The id of the roofing to return the components of.
        Returns:
        The components for the roofing with the provided id.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • update

        public boolean update(java.util.List<ComponentDefinition> definitions)
        Updates the component definitions for a roofing.
        Parameters:
        definitions - The definitions to update.
        Returns:
        true if the component definitions was successfully updated.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.

      • getComponents

        public java.util.List<Component> getComponents(int roofing)
        Returns the components active for the roofing with the provided id.
        Parameters:
        roofing - The id of the roofing to return the active components of.
        Returns:
        The list of the components active for the roofing with the provided id.
        Throws:
        ApplicationException - When a data storage exception occurs while performing the operation.
